CommandFN: for not_vi, a to select all
CommandFN: for not_vi, shift+l to shift+semicolon
CommandFN: for not_vi, shift+semicolon to comma
CommandFN: for not_vi, shift+m to enter
CommandFN: for not_vi, shift+n to down_arrow
CommandFN: for not_vi, shift+o to escape
CommandFN: for not_vi, w to option+[delete_or_backspace], w to close window
CommandFN: for not_vi, m to [enter]
CommandFN: for not_vi, n to [down_arrow]
CommandFN: for not_vi, p to [up_arrow]
CommandFN: for not_vi, x to cut
CommandFN: for not_vi, c to copy
CommandFN: for not_vi, v to paste
CommandFN: for not_vi, f to find
CommandFN: for not_vi, q to quit
CommandFN: for not_vi, r to reload
CommandFN: for not_vi, l to address
CommandFN: for not_vi, z to undo
CommandFN: for not_vi, s to escape
Change Won (₩) to grave accent (`) in Korean layout.
